content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position (y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate factory at position (z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a1) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b1) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to craft items without sufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, to craft iron gear wheels, you need both iron plates and iron gear wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
